fixes.name: Title Date Filter (T-1)
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR useCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR isMatchCustom = IF('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[MAX_DATE -1day] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate], 1, 0)
VAR isMatchDefault = IF('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[End DATE - 1day], 1, 0)
RETURN IF(useCustom = TRUE, isMatchCustom, isMatchDefault)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the nested IF logic from Tableau to DAX. Parameter [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] was converted to SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As]). All column references were transformed to the table-qualified form 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[ColumnName]. The expression returns 1 or 0 matching the original logic.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter ([Parameters].[Use Custom Date]); per rules, parameter-based calculations must be measures.
